square.obstacle

Class LightTrail

  • java.lang.Object
    • square.MultiSquare
      • square.obstacle.MultiObstacle
        • square.obstacle.LightTrail
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Obstacle

    public class LightTrail
extends MultiObstacle
    LightTrail is a trail that is left behind the player while he executes actions on the grid. The LightTrail is an obstacle.
    Author:
    Dieter Castel, Jonas Devlieghere and Stefan Pante

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_LENGTH
      Maximum length of a LightTrail.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LightTrail()
      Initialises a new linkedList for the LightTrail.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSquare(Square square)
      Extend the light trail by adding a new square to the trail.
      boolean bouncesBack()
      The LightTrail bounces a launchable item back onto the previous square it passed.

      Returns the last square that was added in the LightTrail.

      • getLastSquare

        public Square getLastSquare()
        Returns the last square that was added in the LightTrail.
        Returns:
        Square If the trail is not empty the last one is returned. Null If the trail is empty.

      • getNewestSquare

        public Square getNewestSquare()
        Returns the newest square which was recently added.
        Returns:
        Square If the trail is not empty the newest one is returned. Null If the trail is empty.

      • bouncesBack

        public boolean bouncesBack()
        The LightTrail bounces a launchable item back onto the previous square it passed.
        Returns:
        True always.
